channel.title: Godboxv2 on Tiernan's Comms Closet
channel.description: Recent content in Godboxv2 on Tiernan's Comms Closet

item.title: Windows Server 2012 R2 returning to The GodBoxV2
item.description: After a few months of running Sabayon Linux on the GodboxV2, i am going back to Windows Server. Back around October of last year, i installed Windows 10 Preview on the GodBoxV2, and, well, there where issues with graphics drivers, etc. Then, some time after, i cant remember off hand when, i moved to Sabayon Linux. Its based on Gentoo but has a lot of the components pre-built. Gentoo is a “Build from scratch” sort of OS.
